name: Game Jam - Death is only the beginning, Tale of Tamsin
name_original: Game Jam - Death is only the beginning, Tale of Tamsin
description:
This was my first gamejam, i was working a lot throughout so didn't have much time, but I wanted to convey a message - that there is hope when all seems lost, even in death. You are Tamsin, one of the few survivors after the machines took over and accessed the nuke codes.

Use w,a,s,d  or the arrow kes to move. Walk up to the npcs to hear what they will say.

There was some build errors, so its come out quite laggy and I had to redo scene 2 so its not as polished as before. Learned a lot which is the main thing!
